Reviews.Title: This product is great!
Reviews.Author: secure2010
Reviews.Content: Bought one as a replacement camera to my busted cctv cam. Upon using it, it gave me excellent view in the day and especially in the evening. the cam is easy to install and is compatible with my dvr. price is not cheap but its worth it. Happy to have one.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powered by 1/3" Sony Effio CCD Technology, Color DSP image sensor
700TV lines high resolution. Weatherproof housing
Built-in 3.6mm lens for wide view. 0 lux with IR LED
28 built-in IR illuminators. All metal weatherproof housing and bracket
Package included: 1 x high resolution camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 x video power extension cable and 1 x free warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Bullet Surveillance CCTV Security Camera Built-in SONY Effio CCD Outdoor Day Night IR Infrared Wide Angle High Resolution with Bonus Power Supply and Extension Cable 1YW
